history: 1.2.5 Small Bug Fix and Features Sprint11-10-2012Switched .Net 4.0 with .Net 4.5 allowing more than 2GB memory usage for one vApus instance.A new solution can now be created from a template.Simplified the vApus updater, all settings are done in the settings panel, the updater window is now just a checksum list.Simplified the connection proxies editor.Fixed the custom list generator.Minor issues with the wizard, run sync and monitor report tabs fixed.Parameters can be used in a test with action and log entry distribution now.Monitors can start before and end after a test.And a whole bunch of smaller issues...1.2.0 Released!01-10-2012User friendly distributed testing, complete with wizard.Properties (1.1.1)11-05-2012Properties of an item (stresstest for instance) default to the first available item in the solution (if applicable).Removed some property controls (like for Label) from the property panels.Monitoring (1.1.0)02-05-2012Stable monitoring added.Options (1.0.9)25-04-2012vApus checks if the Windows firewall and/or the Windows Auto Update is enabled, you can and should disable them from within vApus.Update Notifier (1.0.9)25-04-2012Shows changelog when vApus detects an update.HotFix Monitor View (1.0.8)24-04-2012It was impossible to monitor while stresstesting because the counters were not filled in correctly.Connection View (1.0.7)24-04-2012The connection route can be traced from this view.Connection Proxy Code View (1.0.7)23-04-2012Updates the panel while scrolling now.Bug reporting (1.0.6)18-04-2012It is now possible to report bugs from the application log panel in vApus to Sizing Servers.Custom List Parameters (1.0.5)17-04-2012Removed label control from generate from type dialog.Can now be generated from custom random parameter.Custom Random Parameter (1.0.5)16-04-2012Added line numbersTest code button now instead of try compile.Numeric Parameters (1.0.5)13-04-2012Decimal separator can be set here.Flat style controls (1.0.5)13-04-2012For parameters and connection proxy GUI.Stopping a scheduled test (1.0.4)13-04-2012A stresstest could not be stopped before the test was actually started (while the schedule timer was running).Fixed Connection Proxy Code Scrolling (1.0.3)12-04-2012When clicking around the view was very prone to scroll to the wrong place.HotFix Connection Proxy Code (1.0.2)10-04-2012Connections could not be tested from here anymore.HotFix Parameters (1.0.1)28-03-2012Numeric parameters did not always respect its given boundaries.First Master Build (1.0.0
